reuters.title: FAIR LANES <FAIR> SHAREHOLDERS APPROVE MERGER
reuters.body: Fair Lanes Inc said its shareholders approved the previously announced merger with Maricorp Inc, a unit of <Northern Pacific Corp>. Under terms of the merger, Fair Lanes said each of its shares of common stock will be converted into the right to receive 1.3043 shares of <BTR Realty Inc>, which is owned by Fair Lines. Reuter 
